titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Philadelphia Union Society was a women's voluntary association organized to support a female charity school and other educational programs for children.

scopecontent.p: This is a volume of minutes of the Philadelphia Union Society, for meetings held from 1808 to 1841. The minutes include the Society's constitution, act of incorporation, and by-laws; elections of officers; committee appointments and reports; treasurer's reports; and other routine business. The volume also includes a list of members between 1805 and 1814.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
